name: Soul Hackers 2 1999 (Fixed Game BREAKING Bug)
description:
PARADIGM X is back online, but something is wrong manitou has risen, Hitomi has returned from America but her health is on the bad side, journey through inside of hitomi and save Hitomi and defeat manitou, giving peace back to Amami City In Soul Hackers 2 1999
